AboutMe.title: MEET BEATRIZ
AboutMe.paragraph: Hi! I’m Beatriz, a Computer Science student who enjoys expressing herself creatively, whether through code, crafts, or visual arts. I love mixing logic with art, especially when I get to learn new things and build beautiful, meaningful projects. When I’m not working on something new, you’ll probably find me spending time in nature, which inspires and often finds its way into most of my creations.

Contact.title: CONTACT ME
Contact.text: For professinal inquiries, you can reach me through email or LinkedIn

WIP.text: We are currently still working on this page!
